description: The generation that received compulsory education between 2002 and 2011. People born in the Heisei era (1989-2019) are sometimes called "Heisei pigs" in Chinese.

examples.translation: He is a student of the relaxed generation

examples.chinese: 讨论宽松世代的教育改革
examples.translation: Discussing education reform for the relaxed generation
The relaxed generation enters the workforce
